attributes.action: David Cameron should apologize to the UK Muslim community from his new speech
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron  should apologize to the UK Muslim community ,for  a pathetic speech that only targets Muslim community.
attributes.background: David Cameron should apologize to whole UK Muslim community and scarp the pathetic scheme which is waste of money and respect peoples freedom and rights

rejection.details: We're not sure what action this petition is asking for, since it's not clear which speech the Prime Minister is being asked to apologise for.
